stories.title: Sign up with Email
stories.description: As a new user, I want to sign up using my email so that I can create an account.
acceptance_criteria: System should validate the email format.
If email is already registered, prompt the user to log in.
User should be able to set a password (6-24 characters, 1 number required).

stories.title: Sign up with Google
stories.description: As a new user, I want to sign up using Google so that I can quickly create an account.
acceptance_criteria: If the user’s Google account is already linked, direct them to login.

stories.title: Log in with Email
stories.description: As a returning user, I want to log in with my email so that I can access my account.
acceptance_criteria: If incorrect, prompt the user with an error message.

stories.title: Log in with Google
stories.description: As a returning user, I want to log in using Google so that I can access my account without remembering credentials.

stories.title: Reset Password
stories.description: As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it so that I can regain access to my account.
acceptance_criteria: User should be able to request a password reset link via email.
Link should expire after a defined period.

stories.title: AI answers HR-related questions
stories.description: As a user, I want to ask HR-related questions so that I can get AI-generated responses based on company policies.
acceptance_criteria: System should fetch relevant policy details using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG).

stories.title: Request vacation time
stories.description: As a user, I want to request vacation time so that I can manage my leaves through the HR backend.
acceptance_criteria: System should generate a confirmation or failure response.
If successful, provide a link to Workday for tracking.

stories.title: AI processes uploaded images
stories.description: As a user, I want the AI to understand my uploaded images so that I can interact with visual content.
acceptance_criteria: AI should process text and vision-based queries.

stories.title: Fine-tune AI model
stories.description: As a user, I want to fine-tune the AI model based on my company’s data so that responses are tailored to my organization.

stories.title: Prevent prohibited AI responses
stories.description: As an admin, I want to ensure AI responses do not contain prohibited content so that we comply with company policies.
acceptance_criteria: AI should refuse to generate harmful content and provide a Terms of Service link instead.

stories.title: Track AI accuracy and performance
stories.description: As an admin, I want to track AI accuracy and performance so that I can improve the model’s response quality.

stories.title: AI uses preferred pronouns
stories.description: As a user, I want the AI to use my preferred pronouns so that responses feel personalized.

stories.title: Retry AI response generation
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a retry button if AI fails to generate a response so that I can try again.

stories.title: Notify user on request failure
stories.description: As a user, I want to be notified if my request fails due to a backend error so that I can take alternative action.
